Key Match Events: Kiké Hernández hit a home run in the 2nd inning to give the Dodgers a 1-0 lead
Teoscar Hernández's home run in the 7th inning extended the Dodgers' lead to 2-0
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers successfully avoided a third straight NLDS elimination
The Padres went scoreless for the final 24 innings of the series, dropping the last two games after taking a 2-1 lead back home
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yoshinobu Yamamoto outdueled Yu Darvish in a historic playoff matchup of Japanese-born starters
The Dodgers will play Pete Alonso and the New York Mets in the best-of-seven NLCS starting Sunday night in Los Angeles
Others: The Dodgers won a decisive Game 5 at home for the first time since taking a 1981 NL Division Series against Houston
The Padres' big hitters went bust with their season on the line
The teams combined to score 43 runs in the first five games of the series, but the winner-take-all finale was a tense pitching affair
